languages.text: "Если мой Инфернус-мастер утверждает, что они угрожают кораблю — мне этого довольно. Разогнать их".
"If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
languages.original_text: "Если мой Инфернус-мастер утверждает, что они угрожают кораблю — мне этого довольно. Разогнать их".

traits.locale_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
"If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
"If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
"If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
"If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
"If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."

languages.text: «Si mi maestro de infernus dice que son un peligro para la nave, le creo. Disperse a los alborotadores».
languages.original_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."

traits.locale_text: «Si mi maestro de infernus dice que son un peligro para la nave, le creo. Disperse a los alborotadores».

languages.text: 「私のインフェルヌス・マスターが、船にとっての危険だと言うのなら、そうなのでしょう。彼らをを解散させろ」
languages.original_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."

traits.locale_text: 「私のインフェルヌス・マスターが、船にとっての危険だと言うのなら、そうなのでしょう。彼らをを解散させろ」

languages.text: “既然我的控火大师说这艘船有危险，那我相信他的话。驱散所有捣乱的人。”
languages.original_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."

traits.locale_text: “既然我的控火大师说这艘船有危险，那我相信他的话。驱散所有捣乱的人。”

languages.text: "Wenn mein Infernus-Meister sagt, dass sie eine Gefahr für das Schiff darstellen, reicht mir das völlig. Zerstreut die Unruhestifter."
languages.original_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn mein Infernus-Meister sagt, dass sie eine Gefahr für das Schiff darstellen, reicht mir das völlig. Zerstreut die Unruhestifter."

languages.text: « Si mon maître-infernus prétend qu'ils représentent un danger pour le vaisseau, il n'en faut pas plus pour me convaincre. Dispersez les agitateurs. »
languages.original_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."

traits.locale_text: « Si mon maître-infernus prétend qu'ils représentent un danger pour le vaisseau, il n'en faut pas plus pour me convaincre. Dispersez les agitateurs. »

languages.text: "İtfa Üstadım, gemi için tehlike teşkil ettiklerini söylüyorsa kabulümdür. Baş belalarını dağıtın."
languages.original_text: "If my Infernus Master says they are a danger to the ship, then I am convinced. Disperse the troublemakers."
